<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;color:#262626;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#262626;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">项目网站：<span lang="EN-US">cgdb.sourceforge.net</span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">       </span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">cgdb</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">可以看作<span lang="EN-US">gdb</span>的界面增强版，用来替代<span lang="EN-US">gdb</span>的<span lang="EN-US"> gdb -tui</span>。<span lang="EN-US">cgdb</span>主要功能是在调试时进行代码的同步显示，这无疑增加了调试的方便性，提高了调试效率。界面类似<span lang="EN-US">vi</span>，符合<span lang="EN-US">unix/linux</span>下开发人员习惯，所以如果熟悉<span lang="EN-US">gdb</span>和<span lang="EN-US">vi</span>，几乎可以立即使用<span lang="EN-US">cgdb</span>。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#262626;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">主要功能介绍：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#262626;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">1</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#262626;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">） 相比<span lang="EN-US">GDB</span>，增加了语法加亮的代码窗口，显示在<span lang="EN-US">GDB</span>窗口的上部，随<span lang="EN-US">GDB</span>的调试位置代码同步显示。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">2</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#262626;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">） 断点设置可视化 。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#262626;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">3</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#262626;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">） 在代码窗口中可使用<span lang="EN-US">GDB</span>常用命令 。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">4</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#262626;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">） 在代码窗口可进行代码查找，支持正则表达式 。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#262626;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">通过<span lang="EN-US">cgdb test</span>启动（<span lang="EN-US">gcc
test.c -g -o test</span>）后的界面如下：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#262626;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>
